|brand = Radxa |model = Rock Pi |submodelappend = yes |submodel = X |revision = V1.41 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = B4E32 |wlclass = AC600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel Atom;Z8350;x5-Z8350, Cherry Trail, SR2KT; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- x86-64 Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.44 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Foresee;FSE1ASLD-32G; |flash1size = 32 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = SPI |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Winbond;W25Q64JWSIQ; |flash2size = 8 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = Title Max;TH16G32MD3LDAM-H2; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = Realtek;RTL8111F; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 9 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB Female Type-C |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 10-pin FPC,, (115200 8,N,1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI 1.4, Micro SD Card slot, RTC, Audio 3.5mm out, Bluetooth 4.2 LE, PoE Expansion header, SPI, I2C, I2S, SPDIF, ADC, GPIO |addchip = Power Management IC;Rockchip;RK809-5;;1;,,, PCI Express Clock;Diodes Inc;PI6C557-03;;1;,,, I2C RTC;Haoyu Microelectronics;HYM8563;;1;,,, USB 2.0 High Speed 4-Port Hub Controller;JFD;FE1.1s;;1;,,, USB PD Power Receiving Protocol Chip;WCH;CH224;;1;,,, 4.8A Charging IC w/ Fast Charging Protocol;Injoinic Tech;IP2315;;1;,,, 5A Synchronous Step-Down DC-DC Converter;Tctek;TCS4525;;1;,,, 2A, 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy Corp;SY8089;;1;,,, 5.5V, 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy Corp;SY6280;;4;,,, 18V, 5A Synchronous Step-Down DC/DC Converter;Silicon Content Tech;SCT2250;;2;,,, Fixed 5V, 8A Synchronous Buck Converter w/100mA LDO;MPS;NB679;;1;,,, High-PSRR 500mA LDO;Powtech;PT5108;;2;,,, 16Kb Serial EEPROM;Shanghai Belling;BL24C16A;;1;,,, 4-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Translator;Union Semi;UM3204;;1;,,, 4-Lines Uni-directional Transient Voltage Suppressor;Will Semi;ESD5344;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 10/2020 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 4038816191250 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B08NJZDXS7 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AMPAK AP6254 |rad1modif = SDIO (module) |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43455; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 433 |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview==
{{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Intel Atom]] x5-Z8350 @1.44GHz (Turbo @1.92GHz) :GPU: [[Intel]] HD Graphics 400 (4K UHD, Full HD) *Memory: 4GB (LPDDR3) SDRAM *Storage: 8MB SPI Flash, 32GB eMMC, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 1x USB 3.0 (OTG), 3x USB 2.0 ports *GPIO: 1x 40-pin headers *Power Source: USB Type-C supporting USB PD 2.0 :and Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0
==Links of Interest== *[https://linuxgizmos.com/intel-based-rock-pi-x-sbc-arrives/ ''Intel-based Rock Pi X SBC arrives'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/10/02/buy-rock-pi-x-windows-10-sbc/ ''Windows 10 capable Rock Pi X SBC Launched'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://liliputing.com/2020/10/the-59-rock-pi-x-is-like-a-windows-compatible-raspberry-pi-with-an-x86-processor.html ''The $59 Rock Pi X is like a Windows-compatible Raspberry Pi'' on '''Liliputing''']
